result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

PLEA:
15CM2119:
Ct. 1 Possess Drug Paraphernalia >> NO CONTEST 
15CM2425:
Ct. 1 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> NO CONTEST 
Ct. 2 Retail Theft- intentionally take (<$500) >> NO CONTEST 
16CM188:

16CM475:
Ct. 1 Possession of THC >> NO CONTEST
16CM1705:
Ct. 1 Theft-movable property <=$2500, PTAC >> NO CONTEST 
Ct. 2 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> NO CONTEST
16CM1781:
Ct. 1 Theft-movable property <=$2500 >> NO CONTEST 
Ct. 4 Resisting or Obstructing an officer >> NO CONTEST 
Ct. 5 Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor >> NO CONTEST 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: w/hold sentencing. 2 years probation, concurrent. CONDITIONS: Complete any assessment, treatment, or counseling deemed necessary by agent. Complete AODA assessment with follow through. Complete corrective thinking program. Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol, unless has valid prescription and only take as prescriped. Perform 60 hours community service. Maintain GFE in full time employement/schooling/combination of two, when not fully engaged complete 9 hours community service per week. Restitution to be determined within next 60 days. Pay CC. Pay DNA surchargea and provide sample. ONLY in 16CM1781 Ct. 5 (Bail Jumping- Misdemeanor) Serve 6 months MCJ, may be with huber release for work, work search, or treatment if meets jail criteria. 

Atty Kohn to provide stipulation to court on jail credit if revoked on all cases, EXCEPT Ct. 5 in 16CM1781. 
COURT DOES NOT allow expungement due to numerous charges deft has plead to

Adj: 9:10am
w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief
